instructions: Put the dinner plate on the table cloth.
Put the dinner fork to the right of the dinner plate with the head point upwards.
Put the salad fork to the left of the dinner fork with the head pointing upwards.
Put the dinner knife to the right of the dinner plate with the blade pointing upwards.
Put the salad knife to the right of the dinner knife with the blade pointing upwards.
Put the spoon to the right of the salad knife with the bowl pointing upwards.
Put the water glass on the table cloth above and between the dinner plate and the dinner knife
put the wine glass to the right of the Water glass
put a second wine glass to the right of the first wine glass
put a coffee cup on the table cloth to the right of the soup spoon
Put the bread plate on the table cloth above the dinner fork.
Put the butter knife on the top right side of the bread plate.
Put the dessert fork on the table cloth above the dinner plate with the head pointing right.
Put the dessert spoon on the table cloth above the dessert fork with the bowl pointing left.
Put the napkin in the center of the dinner plate vertically.
